p: Edinburgh Instruments FLS980 spectrometer (Edinburgh Instruments, Livingston, UK) was used to measure reflection spectra. The spectrometer possessed a 450 W ozone free xenon arc lamp, a cooled (−20 °C) SPC photomultiplier (Hamamatsu R928P, Hamamatsu Photonics K.K., Hamamatsu, Japan) and Teflon coated integration sphere. The reflectance standard was BaSO 4.
